name: lobe
content:
lobe noun [C]
(ORGAN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
anatomy
  specialized any part of an organ that seems to be separate in some way from the rest, especially one of the parts of the brain, lungs, or liver: the frontal lobe of the brain

lobe noun [C]
(LEAF)
biology
  specialized a rounded or pointed part on a leaf that sticks out from the main part: The leaf is divided into several lobes. The oval green leaves are simple and have three shallow lobes.
